title: PL GIFT Jacobian Cosine Similarity Detector
technique_description: Computes Jacobian of test model and compares it to reference model.

infer_path_adv_examples.description: Path to save adversarial examples from Drebbin dataset

infer_path_drebbin_x_train.description: Path to drebbin x train dataset

infer_path_drebbin_x_test.description: Path to drebbin x test dataset

infer_path_drebbin_y_train.description: Path to drebbin y train dataset

infer_path_drebbin_y_test.description: Path to drebbin y test dataset

infer_calc_drebbin_adv.description: Flag for calculating drebbin adversarial examples

infer_save_adv_examples.description: Flag for calculating drebbin adversarial examples

infer_grad_magnitude.description: Gradient magnitude in fast gradient sign method

infer_aug_dataset_factor.description: Dataset augmentation factor where binomial pert are applied

infer_aug_bin_prob.description: Binomial distribution parameter p for adding perturbations

infer_platform.description: Platform where the code will be run

infer_random_noise_augmentation.description: Data input augmentation with random sampling

infer_no_features_least.description: No of least important features to select

infer_no_features_most.description: No of most important features to select

infer_extra_data_augmentation.description: Options to augment the three samples dataset

train_random_forest_feature_importance.description: Option to train a random forest model for feature importance

infer_feature_importance_path.description: Relative path where to save rf feature importance

infer_feature_extraction_method.description: Method used to extract features of a model and dataset!!!

infer_proximity_aggregation_method.description: Method used to compare and aggregate extracted features from the models!!!

infer_adv_ex_file_class01_pc0.description: File name for adversarial examples for class 0 probability switching from class 0 to 1

infer_adv_ex_file_class10_pc0.description: File name for adversarial examples for class 0 probability switching from class 1 to 0

infer_adv_ex_file_class01_pc1.description: File name for adversarial examples for class 1 probability switching from class 0 to 1

infer_adv_ex_file_class10_pc1.description: File name for adversarial examples for class 1 probability switching from class 1 to 0
